properties.name: Bell Community Garden
properties.contact_information:
Hannah Reinhart
Phone: (314) 558-9600 ext. 104
Email: hannah@gatewaygreening.org
properties.description:
Known as Gateway Greeningâ€™s outdoor office, Bell Demonstration Garden is a thriving community resource for urban gardening activities. It features a traditional community garden as well as 20 garden demonstration beds. Each week, food from the gardens is weighed, shared with volunteers and delivered to a local soup kitchen. Visit to help us out, borrow some tools or just to learn more about gardening.

Bell Garden is also home to The Carriage House and Community Coop.

Hours:
Saturday: 9am-12pm
March â€“ October

Features:
Bell Market Stand
Seed distribution
Tool loans
Garden education workshops
20 garden demonstration beds
Picnic shelter
Composting area
Volunteer orientation
Field Trips

properties.name: 13th Street Community Garden
properties.description:
The 13th Street Gardens is one of the vendors at the Old North Farmerâ€™s market on 14th Street providing healthy, fresh food for the neighborhood. You can visit the Old North Farmerâ€™s Market June-October to see whatâ€™s growing.
Visit the garden for its rainwater harvesting demonstrations, to rent a garden bed, adopt a chicken or rent an accessible bed.

Opening Date:
March 16

Hours:
Saturday: 8am-12pm
Tuesday: 5:30pm-7pm

Features:
Seed distribution
Tool loans
Garden education workshops
Chicken coop

Handicap Accessible
